answers.answer: Free medical care, medical consultations, and access to some medical services are available, including consultations from a family doctor, therapist, or pediatrician.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Medical assistance to refugees from Ukraine is offered by IOM Romania, the Ukrainian clinic MedZirka, and Red Cross Romania with support from the French Red Cross.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Individuals can access free consultations from MedZirka by filling in a declaration, and free medical consultations are also available at the Red Cross Health Promotion Center.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The content states that IOM Romania provides free medical care, but does not specify the exact types of medical services offered.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the section under 'Medical assistance offered by IOM Romania to refugees from Ukraine'.

answers.answer: Free medical care from IOM Romania is available to Ukrainians and refugees from other countries.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the section under 'Medical assistance offered by IOM Romania to refugees from Ukraine'.

answers.answer: Through MedZirka, individuals can get consultations from a family doctor, therapist, or pediatrician.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the section under 'Free medical consultations from the Ukrainian clinic MedZirka'.

answers.answer: Someone can get free consultations from MedZirka after filling in the declaration.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the section under 'Free medical consultations from the Ukrainian clinic MedZirka'.

answers.answer: MedZirka delivers its medical services both online and offline.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopopoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the section under 'Free medical consultations from the Ukrainian clinic MedZirka'.

answers.answer: The Health Promotion Center from the Red Cross is located in Bucharest.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the section under 'Free medical care at the Health Promotion Center from the Red Cross'.

answers.answer: The Health Promotion Center from the Red Cross offers free medical consultations and access to some medical services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the section under 'Free medical care at the Health Promotion Center from the Red Cross'.

answers.answer: Every refugee from Ukraine can receive care at the Red Cross Health Promotion Center.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the section under 'Free medical care at the Health Promotion Center from the Red Cross'.
